title: Add Admin Panel link to hamburger menu

requirements.text: Add an 'Admin Panel' link/button inside the hamburger (mobile) menu in the Header component, visible only to authenticated admin users — consistent with the existing desktop admin button logic already present in Header.tsx.

quotes: एडमिन पैनल का लिंक/बटन हैमबर्गर मीनू में जोड़े

acceptanceCriteria: When the hamburger menu is open on mobile, an 'Admin Panel' button/link appears in the menu list.
The Admin Panel button is only visible to users who are authenticated as admin (same role check used for the desktop header button).
Clicking the Admin Panel button in the hamburger menu opens the admin panel and closes the mobile menu.
Non-admin and unauthenticated users do not see the Admin Panel option in the hamburger menu.
The button styling is consistent with the rest of the hamburger menu items.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths).
Do not alter the existing desktop admin panel button behavior in Header.tsx.
Admin panel visibility must use the same role/auth check already implemented for the desktop view.
nonGoals: Redesigning the header or hamburger menu layout.
Adding admin panel access to the footer or any other section.
Changing admin authentication or role logic in the backend.
